faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Is business insurance mandatory in the UAE?
items.answer: While not all types are mandatory, workers’ compensation is legally required. Depending on your business model, other insurances may be contractually or operationally essential.

items.question: How much time does it take to get a business insurance policy?
items.answer: Once your application is complete, we typically issue a policy within 24-48 hours.

items.question: What happens if I have insufficient insurance?
items.answer: Inadequate insurance coverage puts your business at risk of financial losses and visa issues.

items.question: Can I get business insurance if I have multiple business locations?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our specialists help structure a policy that covers all locations under one streamline plan.

items.question: Do your business insurance plans cover pre-existing conditions?
items.answer: Yes, most of our insurance coverages include pre-existing conditions, protecting your busines against liabilities and losses.
